company_name: EXPRO - Saudi Standards Metrology and Quality Organization
policy_holder: Saudi Standards Metrology and Quality Organization

coverage_details.std: Covered regardless of how the infection occurred (Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus/genital warts, Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid)
coverage_details.checkup: Covered in line with National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to SR 9,999,999.99 as per MOH schedule; for children up to 6 years old and RSV vaccine per MOH
coverage_details.optical_frame: Up to SR 2,000.00; Frames covered twice for children up to 14 years
coverage_details.birth_control: Female birth control covered up to SR 1,500 (Not covered for Parents scheme)
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Covered if BMI ≥ 40, or BMI ≥ 35 with complications, up to overall obesity treatment coverage of SR 20,000; list of approved surgical procedures provided
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: Covered up to overall obesity treatment coverage of SR 20,000
coverage_details.kidney_transplant: Covered up to SR 250,000 per insurance cover period
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Donor organ harvesting covered up to SR 50,000; surgery for donor is covered
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: National program for early detection for newborns covered up to SR 100,000; neonatal metabolic screening covered (disability cases)
coverage_details.psychiatric: Covered up to SR 50,000 (including non-acute psychiatric cases, up to 4 visits)
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Covered up to SR 6,000; newborn hearing screening as part of national program up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.dental_general: Up to SR 5,000 with 20% up to 100 SR deductible; scaling covered once per year; pins/posts for crowns, crowns/bridges covered
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Premature babies care covered up to annual limit; newborns covered under mother's policy up to 30 days
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: National early detection program covered up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.congenital: Acute congenital illnesses covered up to annual limit; non-acute congenital up to SR 50,000
coverage_details.maternity: Anti-natal care and NVD up to SR 15,000; caesarian/abortion and complications to annual limit; not covered for parents; epidural injection covered
coverage_details.optical: Up to SR 2,000 (contact lenses and frames); subject to deductible
coverage_details.screening: General screening, including metabolic and hearing screening for newborns, covered
coverage_details.disability_cases: Coverage including neonatal metabolic screening up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit; standard pre-authorization applies.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Standard suite covered up to SR 4,000; companion covered for all members and parents; all joint replacement up to SR 50,000; rehabilitation/artificial limbs up to SR 100,000; local ambulance and allergy tests/treatment covered if medically prescribed; intensive care and psoriasis covered; transportation of mortal remains up to SR 10,000; family planning contraceptives for females up to SR 1,500; infectious diseases requiring isolation covered at MOH-appointed hospitals; Home Healthcare (post-surgery wound dressing, catheter replacement, IV fluids) covered; telemedicine covered; International S.O.S covered for emergency evacuation from outside KSA to Saudi hospital; medical devices for diabetes/pressure/steam covered; nutritional supplements, vitamins, and minerals covered if essential and prescribed by SFDA-registered physicians; baby milk up to 24 months of age if medically needed; covered benefits as per CHI unless otherwise limited.
